com.socialize.util
Class SafeBitmapDrawable

java.lang.Object
  android.graphics.drawable.Drawable
      android.graphics.drawable.BitmapDrawable
          com.socialize.util.SafeBitmapDrawable
Direct Known Subclasses:
CacheableDrawable
public class SafeBitmapDrawable
extends BitmapDrawable

Because bitmaps may expire in cache while still attached to a view, we need to provide a catch-all otherwise the app will crash if a view tries to draw a recycled bitmap.

Author:
jasonpolites
